CSE391: Course Description: This 1-credit course builds a foundation in essential command-line and software tools...

Learning Goals:

- Use Unix shell commands
- Utilize Git for version control

Topics Covered:

- Shell basics
- Git workflows
CSE444: Course Description: CSE 444 introduces the foundations of database management systems...

Learning Goals:

- Design normalized schemas
- Write optimized SQL queries

Topics Covered:

- Relational model
- SQL
- Normalization
- Transactions
